# tbl_hierarchicial()

## Adverse Event Reporting (and friends)

Use `tbl_hierarchicial()` and `tbl_hierarchicial_count()` for reporting of AEs, Con Meds, and more.

```{r}
#| label: create-ae-tbl
tbl_ae <- adae |> 
  tbl_hierarchical(
    by = "ARM2", 
    variables = c("AESOC", "AEDECOD"),
    id = "USUBJID",
    denominator = adsl
  )
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| label: print-ae-tbl
tbl_ae
```
